snippet.title: Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony – Launch Trailer | PS4, PS Vita
snippet.description:
Learn more: http://danganronpa.us/v3/
Website: danganronpa.us/v3
Available Now @ http://bit.ly/KillingHarmony

Puhuhu! The Killing Game has officially begun! Danganronpa V3, the latest installment to the thrilling Danganronpa franchise, is now available on the PS4 and PS Vita. Meet an entirely new cast of Ultimates, lie your way to the truth with new Lie Bullets, and participate in Mass Panic Debates to find the culprit! Who lives and who dies in Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony? Well… it’s up to you to find out!

http://danganronpa.us/v3

Rated Mature: Blood, Drug Reference, Intense Violence, Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, Strong Language

©Spike Chunsoft Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved. Licensed to and published by NIS America Inc. “DANGANRONPA” is a registered trademark of Spike Chunso
ft Co., Ltd.
